DataElement.preferredName: MBSImP Component 13 Pharyngeal Contraction Anterior Posterior View Only Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric score for the assessment of pharyngeal contraction (A/P view only) in the pharyngeal impairment section of the Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile Pharyngeal Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Pharyngeal Contraction
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function._An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing._An observation of an individual's pharyngeal contraction during swallowing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Concepts.definition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Property.preferredName: Pharyngeal Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Pharyngeal Contraction
Property.preferredDefinition: An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing.:An observation of an individual's pharyngeal contraction during swallowing.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing.
An observation of an individual's pharyngeal contraction during swallowing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: MBSImP:Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile, Martin-Harris et al., 2008
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret study in Rave as requested by D.Lawrence. mc 6/8/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of bilateral bulging on pharyngeal contraction during swallowing.

Concepts.definition: A finding of bilateral bulging on pharyngeal contraction during swallowing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of unilateral bulging on pharyngeal contraction during swallowing.

Concepts.definition: A finding of unilateral bulging on pharyngeal contraction during swallowing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of incomplete pharyngeal contraction during swallowing.

Concepts.definition: A finding of incomplete pharyngeal contraction during swallowing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of complete pharyngeal contraction during swallowing.

Concepts.definition: A finding of complete pharyngeal contraction during swallowing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
